Hoboken.Greenwich House Music School: Greenwich House Music School is a community arts school located at 46 Barrow Street in New York City’s Greenwich Village. The School is a part of Greenwich House, an organization started in 1902 as part of the settlement movement providing arts education and social service programs. Greenwich House Music School was started in 1905 by the Greenwich House founder, Mary Kingsbury Simkhovitch, as a place for immigrant children to learn music after school, and has grown into a community music, art and dance school for both children and adults.
